📷 | Newlyweds Ranveer Singh And Deepika Padukone spotted at the airport back from Italy post their wedding 💗 #MrandMrsDeepveer OMG the paps 😱😱😱 #deepveer #ranveersingh #deepikapadukone #deepveernews من مطار مومباي الان بمووت مل هالصحافة اجت لاستقبالهم ع فكرة رانو 😭عم يحمي زوجته
A post shared by DeepVeer Wale 💑👪👰💍 (@deepveer.news) on Nov 17, 2018 at 8:48pm PST
title: With Smile On Faces & Happiness In Their Hearts, Ranveer & Deepika Land In India As A Married Couple
description: Did you know Deepika Padukone cried during her last phera hugging her father Prakasha Padukone during their Anand Karaj wedding, after which Ranveer Singh hugged his father-in-law and assured him that he’ll take care of her until his last breadth. The much-in-love couple got married in Italy and it was quite an emotional affair. Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are man and wife finally. And they
